title: "Using Femtosecond Laser Surface Processing and AI to Predict Surface Emissivity"
excerpt: "In a pre-proof study from the Journal of Quantitative Spectroscopy and Radiative Transfer, researchers used artificial intelligence (AI) models to effectively predict the emissivity of functionalized surfaces produced by the femtosecond laser surface processing method."
